name: Dark Time Tales: Dungeons
description:
***This game is just a DEMO***

Who are you, where are you? How did you end up in this dungeon?

These are the questions you need to solve. This game is a role-playing adventure game. You play as someone who doesn't know what happaned to him. A mysterious person helps you during your adventure.

If you found a bug/spelling error or anything else please notify me!

If you like the concept of this game please stick around because I want to continue developing this game.
